body.p: The Board added a project on consolidation to its agenda to deal with divergence in practice in applying IAS 27 and SIC‑12 Consolidation—Special Purpose Entities. For example, entities varied in their application of the control concept:

li.p: in circumstances in which an investor controls an investee but the investor has less than a majority of the voting rights of the investee (and voting rights are clearly the basis for control).
in circumstances involving special purpose entities (to which the notion of ‘economic substance’ in SIC‑12 applied).
